topics.title: Latest News: Today's big news headlines from India and around the world - NDTV.com
topics.summary: Former India batter Robin Uthappa said the "novelty" around ICC tournaments are tapering off, and the game needs to evolve from an "administrative perspective" to retain the charm

topics.title: Alex Pereira: A deep look into UFC fighter's net worth, records, family, endorsements, and more | International Sports News - The Times of India
topics.summary: Alex Pereira has partnered with numerous brands due to his remarkable success as a UFC star. Some of those include pain relief and recovery brand, AthleticCBD, Poatan for his gear, iGaming company SPR

topics.title: India Global News, Latest World News, India Global Breaking News | NDTV News
topics.summary: Read latest India Global News here. Find latest world news and headlines today based on politics, crime, entertainment, sports, lifestyle, technology and many more at NDTV

keyInsights: **體育賽事面臨吸引力挑戰**：有觀點認為，傳統的國際頂級體育賽事（如ICC板球賽）對觀眾的吸引力可能因缺乏新意而下降，暗示賽事形式或管理需創新。
**格鬥明星成為多元品牌代言人**：頂級UFC運動員的商業價值不僅限於運動裝備，已擴展至健康恢復、iGaming、NFT及健身等多個高關注度領域。
**iGaming品牌積極尋求體育合作**：案例顯示，iGaming公司（如SPRIBE）將與UFC等擁有全球年輕男性粉絲群體的體育明星合作，視為有效的品牌推廣策略。
**印度媒體平台涵蓋廣泛新聞類別**：體育、娛樂、科技等內容是印度主流新聞平台吸引流量的重要組成部分，為相關廣告與合作提供了多元場景。
marketTrends: 印度市場的新聞動態顯示，體育產業與商業品牌的結合日益緊密，特別是格鬥等擁有狂熱粉絲的運動。同時，傳統體育賽事正面臨維持觀眾興趣的挑戰。iGaming等新興行業正透過與體育明星合作，積極尋求品牌曝光和用戶獲取。
